sentence: move the foremost red block to the right of the red block right behind it
move the rearmost red block to the rear left side of the middle red block
move the front purple block to the left so that it can be on the front center side of the workspace
move the green block above the rightmost red block
pick up the right one among the red blocks you have not moved before and place it to the left front corner of the workspace
move the red block which is left front of the rearmost purple block to the back of the first moved red block
